attributes.action: demand MGM studios to produce another season of Stargate Atlantis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Utter disappointment of the last episodes of Stargate Atlantis us UK Viewers,  Ending with some of the poorest story lines they need to make another 20 episodes, and to include the EVIL Asgards and wrap up some of the untied ends to some of the storyline's.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
